comment.author: 59541897@N03
comment._content: this picture is labelled gedam market, eastern soudan, except the map later changed and its now northern nigeria, it should be with sudan pictures

comment.author: 25889396@N02
comment._content:
If this is correctly identified Nigeria (and other pics with the Gedam tag) it is likely to be Gidam, southwest of Maiduguri, NOT Sudan. 
OR Geidam, on the river Yobe, well NE of Nafada, the album owner's home.
